Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Bastion Hotel Düsseldorf Neuss in Neuss, you'll be close to Uedesheimer Rheinbogen and Himmelgeister Rheinbogen. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Castle Mickeln and Freizeitpark Ulenbergstrasse.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Bastion Hotel Düsseldorf Neuss. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Bastion Hotel Düsseldorf Neuss. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Bastion Hotel Düsseldorf Neuss in Neuss, you'll be close to Uedesheimer Rheinbogen and Himmelgeister Rheinbogen. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Castle Mickeln and Freizeitpark Ulenbergstrasse.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Uedesheimer Rheinbogen - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Himmelgeister Rheinbogen - 3.1 km / 2 mi
Castle Mickeln - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Freizeitpark Ulenbergstrasse - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
University of Duesseldorf - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
University Hospital - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Classic Remise Duesseldorf - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Duesseldorf Gate - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Gehry Buildings - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Neuer Zollhof - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Harbor Bridge - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Freizeitpark Niederheider Waldchen - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Mitsubishi Electric Hall - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
K21 Staendehaus - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Parliament of North Rhine-Westphalia - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi

The preferred airport for Bastion Hotel Düsseldorf Neuss is Duesseldorf (DUS-Duesseldorf Intl.) - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
